title: Permabanned... Any hope for me?
body: I was recently in a ranked match, playing as vel'koz. I was on a tilt streak and the kayn on our team was annoying me. I took out my anger on kayn and proceeded to flame the whole game, which we lost. Upon discovering I had been perma'd I sent a support ticket, pleaing for a permanent chat ban or some alternative punishment. I also asked for my skins etc. to be moved to another account. I've lost almost all hope in ever recovering my account, yet I will reform. I made a new account and I'll try and get in to honor level 5 and be an overall exemplary player. I had made many friends on that account and poured countless hours and money into it. I just feel it would be fair to migrate all the skins (i.e. money you spent on the account) to a new one. I'm in the process of reforming my play. I've seen riot unban a couple of perma'd players. I doubt it will happen but I'd like a system to prove your reform, or atleast move your assets. Please help because I don't want to see all I've worked for disappear like this.

replies.body:
Riot doesn't lift bans that were correctly placed. After lots of badgering, they tried unbanning a few last year to see if those people would improve their behavior after such a lucky reprieve, but it didn't work out.

Transferring a permabanned account's content to a new account would totally defeat the purpose of the ban. I don't know why you think it's a reasonable idea.

>I've seen riot unban a couple of perma'd players.

Such as...?

First of all, the skins you had on that account, stay on that account. You accepted the ToS when you created the account, and when you failed to follow those rules despite being warned about your behavior, they are now taken away. 

You had multiple warnings and time to reform between warnings.

> I've seen riot unban a couple of perma'd players.

Examples? They did the unban experiment but 95% of players failed that so Riot won't be doing those anytime soon.

Hope? Absolutely.

Your hope is to start a new account and then decide if losing your account is worth putting your fingers to the keyboard in the future.
Pretty sure you got enough warnings. The 2-week suspension that EVERYONE gets before their permanent suspension is a fair enough warning.

I've gotten an account perma'd before. It was my original main, and no, they do not take anything back. I was toxic, so I guess it just sucks to suck... I spent probably a thousand if not more dollars on that account and it's all gone. It really does blow, but that's how you learn.

Sorry man, but good luck on the rift!

since there is no enter press in this wall of text i dont feel like reading it.
if you got permabanned for toxic behavior, there is no hope left sorry.
